comments:

Can you reproduce this? Preferrably on a VM that reports line numbers in the 
stack traces?

I implemented the reselection such that we select the item at the index 
of the deleted item. However, I missed the case where you delete the last 
item. In this case, we want to select the new last item (at index "numItem - 
1").

Fixed.
